itemInfos.description: Restores some health!
itemInfos.details: Restores 40% of max health initially, then 5% less on each subsequent use. 1% is the minimum.

itemInfos.description: Increases all damage dealt!
itemInfos.details: Increases all arcana damage by 8%

itemInfos.description: Increases fire damage!
itemInfos.details: Increases all fire damage by 12%

itemInfos.description: Increases air damage!
itemInfos.details: Increases all air damage by 12%

itemInfos.description: Increases earth damage!
itemInfos.details: Increases all earth damage by 12%

itemInfos.description: Increases lightning damage!
itemInfos.details: Increases all lightning damage by 12%

itemInfos.description: Increases water damage!
itemInfos.details: Increases all water damage by 12%

itemInfos.description: Increases ferocity of your burn status effects!
itemInfos.details: Increases burn level status affects by 1

itemInfos.description: Increases duration of your shock status effects!
itemInfos.details: Increases shock level status affects by 1

itemInfos.description: Increases potency of your poison status effects!
itemInfos.details: Increases poison level status affects by 1

itemInfos.description: Adds a chance to burn foes!
itemInfos.details: Chance to burn enemies increased by 6.25%

itemInfos.description: Adds a chance to slow foes!
itemInfos.details: Chance to burn enemies increased by 6.25%

itemInfos.description: Adds a chance to poison foes!
itemInfos.details: Chance to poison enemies increased by 6.25%

itemInfos.description: Adds a chance to shock foes!
itemInfos.details: Chance to shock enemies increased by 6.25%

itemInfos.description: Adds a chance to freeze foes!
itemInfos.details: Chance to freeze enemies increased by 6.25%

itemInfos.description: Increases critical hit chance!
itemInfos.details: Chance for arcana to crit increased by 8%

itemInfos.description: Designed by Artisan Mathosse Feadur, this relic triples the critical hit chance for all melee arcana!
itemInfos.details: Chance for melee to crit is doubled

itemInfos.description: Damage increased while at low health!
itemInfos.details: Damage increased by 20% when health is 30% or lower

itemInfos.description: Equipping arcana of the same element increases damage!
itemInfos.details: Increases arcana damage by 4% for that element. Requires at least a pair of matching arcana elements. Only applies to the highest element count

itemInfos.description: Equipping arcana of differing elements increases damage!
itemInfos.details: Increases arcana damage by 4%. Requires at least 2 different element types

itemInfos.description: Increases damage based on how much gold you currently have!
itemInfos.details: Increases arcana damage by 0.04% for each gold you are holding. Gives max of 20% increase (500 gold)

itemInfos.description: Increase damage and movement speed when you're with a true friend!
itemInfos.details: Increases damage by 10%. Increases speed by 15%. Requires 2 players

itemInfos.description: Damage and movement speed is increased while signature arcana is charged!
itemInfos.details: Increases damage by 20%. Increases speed by 24%. Requires full overdrive meter

itemInfos.description: Holding seven fire arcana increases damage! All arcana burns foes!
itemInfos.details: Fire arcana damage increased by 30%. Chance to burn increased to 100%. Burn level increased by 1. Must be holding 7 fire arcana

itemInfos.description: Holding seven lightning arcana increases critical chance! All arcana shocks foes!
itemInfos.details: Fire lightning damage increased by 30%. Chance to shock increased to 100%. Shock level increased by 1. Must be holding 7 lightning arcana

itemInfos.description: Increases ice damage! First half of the Poem of Fiery Rime
itemInfos.details: Increases ice damage by 15%. Removed when Stanza of Fire is picked up to create Poem of Fiery Rime

itemInfos.description: Summons an aura that calls down lightning on nearby enemies!
itemInfos.details: Creates an aura that has a 10% chance to cast lightning on nearby enemies

itemInfos.description: Summons an aura that freezes nearby enemies!
itemInfos.details: Creates an aura that has a 10% chance to freeze nearby enemies

itemInfos.description: Summons an aura that damages nearby enemies!
itemInfos.details: Creates an aura that has a 10% chance to cast fire on nearby enemies

itemInfos.description: Increase damage based on number of relics in inventory!
itemInfos.details: Arcana damage increased 1.25% per relic in inventory

itemInfos.description: Designed by Artisan Steven Wu, this relic increases all damage for every enemy defeated, but loses effectiveness when taking damage!
itemInfos.details: Arcana damage increased by 1% per kill, with a max damage increase of 20% (20 kills). Every time you take a hit, damage is reduced by 0.5%)

itemInfos.description: After evading an attack, all of your attacks are critical hits for a short duration!
itemInfos.details: After evading, gain a 3 second window where all attacks are crits.

itemInfos.description: Adds a chance that enemies will explode when defeated!
itemInfos.details: Adds a 20% chance that enemies will explode with a 3x scaled radius

itemInfos.description: Increase damage against foes that are inflicted with a status ailment!
itemInfos.details: Damage is increased 12% while attacking a frozen, stunned or having any damage over time status ailment

itemInfos.description: Randomly empowers an arcana at the beginning of each stage!
Increases damage dealt for a short while after taking damage!
itemInfos.details: Damaged increased by 20% during a 3 second window after getting hit

itemInfos.description: Following up a basic arcana with another arcana increases its critical hit chance!
itemInfos.details: Critical hit chance increased 25% when using a non-basic arcana directly after a basic arcana

itemInfos.description: Increases critical hit chance at low health!
itemInfos.details: Damage increased 25% when health is 30% or lower

itemInfos.description: Increases fire and lightning arcana damage, but receive more damage from water and earth attacks!
itemInfos.details: Increases fire and lightning damage by 15%. Decreases water and earth damage by 15%

itemInfos.description: All arcana are empowered when at full health!
itemInfos.details: When health is full, all arcana are empowered

itemInfos.description: Your signature takes longer to charge, but can now be used twice on a single charge!
itemInfos.details: Overdrive builds 25% slower, decays 50% faster, but can be used twice on a single charge

itemInfos.description: Increases critical hit damage!
itemInfos.details: Increases crit hit damage by 50%

itemInfos.description: Increases the damage of your signature arcana! Core of the Perfect Time Crystal].
itemInfos.details: Increases signature arcana damage by 25%. Removed when Volatile Gemstone is picked up and replaced by the Perfect Time Crystal

itemInfos.description: Increases damage based on how much of the map you have revealed! Damage increase lasts for the entire trial.
itemInfos.details: Damaged increase 4% for each % of map revealed

itemInfos.description: Defeated enemies have a chance to explode and freeze nearby enemies!
itemInfos.details: 20% chance for enemies to explode on death and freeze nearby enemies. Arcana casts the same spell as Lotus Froststone

itemInfos.description: Not using arcana for a short period of time causes your next spell to be a critical hit!
itemInfos.details: Next arcana attack will crit after not using arcana for 7 seconds. Excludes dashing and using overdrive spells

itemInfos.description: All melee basic arcana have a secondary hit that deals reduced damage!
itemInfos.details: Adds a 2nd hit for all basic arcana that hits for 25% less damage

itemInfos.description: Adds a small chance of dealing massive damage with your critical hits!
itemInfos.details: Adds a 2% chance that a crit attack will deal an additional 300 damage

itemInfos.description: Your charged signature arcana deals more damage every time you use it!
itemInfos.details: Overdrive arcana use increases 2% on each use (overdrive only), up to 40%

itemInfos.description: Increases max health!
itemInfos.details: Increases max health by 10%

itemInfos.description: Increases armor!
itemInfos.details: Increases armor by 5%

itemInfos.description: Increases armor while at low health!
itemInfos.details: Increases armor by 20% when health is at 30% or lower

itemInfos.description: Adds a small chance to evade attacks!
itemInfos.details: Increases evade chance by 8%

itemInfos.description: Increases movement speed!
itemInfos.details: Increases move speed by 12%

itemInfos.description: Briefly hover over pits!
itemInfos.details: Hover over pits for 2 seconds

itemInfos.description: Evade all attacks while dashing!
Release a burst of lightning when taking damage!
itemInfos.details: Upon taking damage, enemies nearby are shocked. Has a 24 second cooldown

itemInfos.description: Prevents burn status effect!
Prevents poison status effect!
Prevents freeze status effect!
Evade all critical hits!
Reduces damage received to a maximum of 10% of max health!
Picking up chaos gems heals for a small amount! Excludes gems collected from Council members.
itemInfos.details: Recover 3 hp per gem picked up outside of boss levels. You also have to be alive and have greater than 0 health (seems like a bugfix)

itemInfos.description: Holding seven air arcana increases movement speed and evasion! All arcana also slows foes!
itemInfos.details: Increases speed by 30%. Increases evade chance by 20%. Chance to burn increased to 100%. Burn level increased by 1. Must be holding 7 fire arcana

itemInfos.description: Holding seven earth arcana increase health and armor and lowers stun and knockback!
itemInfos.details: Increases health by 20%. Increases armor by 20%. Ignores hit stun and knockback statuses. Must be holding 7 earth arcana

itemInfos.description: Every point of damage received adds a page to this thesis! Every 200 pages reduces all damage taken by 1! (Maximum 600 pages)
itemInfos.details: Every hit adds 0.005 to damage reduction but value is reduced to it's integer (0-199 = 0, 200-399 pages = 1, 400-599 pages = 2, 600+ pages = 3)

itemInfos.description: Memorizes the last three attacks taken and reduces damage from attacks of the same type!
itemInfos.details: Reduces damage taken from the last 3 elements by 16%

itemInfos.description: Damage received is expended from your signature meter while you have sufficient charge to shield the attack!
Summons a shield that reflects one projectile! Shield breaks after reflect and respawns on a timer.
itemInfos.details: Gives a shield. Respawns after 18 seconds of being hit once

itemInfos.description: Gain a shield every time a charged signature is not activated and times out!
When healed for more than your maximum health, gain a shield equal to half of the excess heal amount!
itemInfos.details: Overhealing grants a shield at 50% of the overhealed value

itemInfos.description: On clearing a stage, receive a heal based on the map reveal percentage!
itemInfos.details: Gain 0.1% per percentage of the map revealed (10% max healed with 100% map uncovered)

itemInfos.description: Increases the distances traveled by dash arcana!
itemInfos.details: Lowers all cooldowns for dash arcana by 25% and adds an extra dash charge

itemInfos.description: Increases resistance to fire based attacks!
itemInfos.details: Increases fire resistance by 25%

itemInfos.description: Increases resistance to water based attacks!
itemInfos.details: Increases water resistance by 25%

itemInfos.description: Increases resistance to earth based attacks!
itemInfos.details: Increases earth resistance by 25%

itemInfos.description: Arcana of matching elements increases resistance to that element! Requires two or more arcana of the same element.
itemInfos.details: When holding 2 or more of the same element, each adds 5% resistance to that element.

itemInfos.description: Increases armor for a short duration after taking damage!
itemInfos.details: Increases armor by 20% for 3 seconds after getting hit

itemInfos.description: Increases the duration of buff arcana!
itemInfos.details: Increases the duration of buff arcana by 40%

itemInfos.description: Increase movement speed everytime an arcana is used! Speed is increased for each arcana on cooldown.
itemInfos.details: For each arcana on cooldown, increase speed by 10%. Increase lasts for 2.5 seconds

itemInfos.description: Using a fully charged signature arcana heals you instead of producing a signature spell!
itemInfos.details: Heals 5% of health instead of casting overdrive spell

itemInfos.description: Pressing forward into an attack immediately before impact allows you to guard the attack!
itemInfos.details: Parrying an attack gains 15% overdrive. Must be within 45 degrees of the front of the attack to proc

itemInfos.description: Sacrifice all standard arcana in your hand to revive from defeat!
itemInfos.details: Removes all standard arcana after a death, resurrects, and gives back 5% of health per sacrificed arcana (Excludes basic, dash and signature)

itemInfos.description: Destroys all projectiles in the area when hit by a projectile!
itemInfos.details: Destroys projectiles nearby when hit. Has a 12 second cooldown

itemInfos.description: Increases armor for each relic held!
itemInfos.details: Increases armor by 1%. Each relic adds 1% armor for each relic in inventory

itemInfos.description: Adds a chance to evade while at low health!
itemInfos.details: Increases chance to evade by 25% when health is 30% or lower

itemInfos.description: Adds a chance to charm enemies when taking damage!
When taking damage that would defeat you, gain full signature charge and briefly become immune to defeat!
Releases a grove of rooting vines when taking damage!
Revive with low health when defeated! This relic creates health orbs when dropped and is destroyed on use.
Health orbs drop more frequently!
Regenerate health every time you land a critical hit!
Briefly become invulnerable after taking damage in quick succession!
Remaining motionless for a short time causes you to disappear from sight!
Allows you to destroy enemy projectiles with melee basic arcana!
Taking damage increases your max health up to a certain limit!
All healing increases your max health up to a certain limit!
Reduces all cooldowns!
Designed by Artisan Curt 'Tozy' Toczydlowski, this relic reduces cooldowns but also reduces signature charge rate!
Defeating foes lowers active cooldowns!
Increases knockback when striking foes!
Summons a sprite that burns enemies! Only one sprite can be held at a time.
Summons a sprite that slows enemies! Only one sprite can be held at a time.
Summons a sprite that poisons enemies! Only one sprite can be held at a time.
Summons a sprite that shocks enemies! Only one sprite can be held at a time.
Summons a sprite that freezes enemies! Only one sprite can be held at a time.
Signature charge no longer decays while building up!
Signature charge stays active until used!
Signature charges faster at low health!
Receive signature charge when healed!
Increases the damage of summoned agents!
Increases the number of summoned agents, but lowers their health!
Increases the duration of summoned agents!
Basic arcana have an extra combo!
Basic arcana chains are completed automatically!
Adds more uses to all multi-use arcana!
Holding seven water arcana reduces all cooldowns and increases healing!
Using an arcana of a different element reduces the cooldown of the previously used arcana!
Increase gold gain for all wizards! Multiple gloves do not stack.
Gain gold when taking damage!
Reveals the layout and main points of interest of the Chaos Trials!
Rainbows!
All gold costs for relics are discounted!
All gold costs for arcana are discounted!
Adds a chance that an arcana will not go on cooldown after use!
Using a dash arcana immediately after another arcana lowers cooldowns for all arcana of the same element as your dash!
Designed by Artisan PerdyDarnSavvy, this relic activates when taking damage at low health and briefly removes the cooldown on all arcana!
Designed by Artisan Tacobowl8, this relic allows you to look quite dashing as you gallop to max speed with ease!
Gain signature charge when taking damage!
You can no longer be interrupted while activating arcana!
The relic and arcana stores instantly restock after a purchase! Health potions are in short supply and are not restocked.
Enemy projectiles move slower, giving you more time to react!
Your projectiles destroy any other projectiles they strike!
Destroying an enemy projectile grants signature charge energy!
Reveals health bars for all enemies in the Chaos Trials!
Adds a chance that an item purchased in the Chaos Trials will be free of charge!
Gets heavier as you progress through the trials! Drop from inventory to open.
All Knights and Lancers have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.
All Rogues and Archers have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.
All Mages and Summoners have their spells limited! Only one Conqueror item can be in effect at a time.
Gain additional gold when consecutively defeating enemies without taking damage!
Defeating enemies grants a chance to temporarily add unlimited charges to your movement arcana!
Enables you to purchase items with health when you don't have sufficient gold!
Increases fire and ice damage! Adds a chance to freeze and burn foes to fire and ice arcana, respectively.
Increases healing received from all sources!
Makes you believe all your attacks result in critical hits!
Receive a discount whenever you purchase potions from the merchant!
Regain a small amount of health when teleporting to the next area!
Signature damage, charge rate, and decay rate increased!
Revive with low health when defeated but consumes half of current health when picked up! This relic is destroyed on use.
Defeating enemies regenerates health but max health is reduced!
Damage increased but max health is reduced!
Reduces cooldowns by half but receive double damage!
Deal double damage but receive double damage!
Allows you to triple dash but lowers movement speed!
Grants a significant boost in armor! Lose gold every time you are hit.
Damage and stuns are increased but movement speed is reduced for each cursed relic owned!
Your attacks on council members are more pun-ishing! Enemy attacks pack an extra pun-ch.
Increase basic arcana damage! All other damage decreased.
Increases armor but store prices are increased!
Increases damage but store prices are increased!
Enemies have less health, but enemy damage is increased!
Critical hit chance is increased for you and all enemies!
Increases armor but decreases damage!
Enemy max health is lowered, but your health is lowered as well!
Reduces max health but increases max health for each enemy defeated!
Recover full health every time an exit portal is used! Max health is reduced and all healing has no effect.
Expend all gold at the start of each stage and heal for a fraction of the expended amount!
Signature charge rate and decay are increased dramatically but charged signature damage is reduced! Shell of the Perfect Time Crystal.
Increases damage but signature can no longer be charged!
All fire arcana cause burning but receive double damage from water spells! Second half of the Poem of Fiery Rime.
Increases the activation speed of arcana but slows movement speed!
Adds a significant chance to evade attacks but receive double damage!
Immediately receive a large sum of gold! All gold gained, with interest, goes towards paying off this debt.
All chaos gems gained during the Chaos Trials are transmuted into gold!
Regenerate health while at critically low health! Max health is reduced.
A ticket to Lanova Museum's newly opened Chaos Trials exhibit!
A crest presented only to those who have cleared the Chaos Trials!
